html:
Nov 19 - Quebec-based Innergex Renewable Energy has closed on tax equity funding for the 200MW Amazon - Hillcrest solar project in Brown County, Ohio. Following the conclusion of the tax equity investment, the project's long-term capital structure is comprised of a US$74.9m seven-year term loan provided by a lender group led by CIT Group, a US$112.7m tax equity investment by Wells Fargo, and US$120.1m in sponsor equity. The project started operating in May and supplies power under a long-term corporate power purchase agreement (PPA). Innergex acquired the project in October 2018 from a joint venture between Open Road Renewables and Eolian.

(Alison Healey)

((alison.healey1@refinitiv.com))
